sentences.en: Blacken'is a causative verb meaning cause to become black '.
sentences.cn: blacken是 使役动词,意思是`使变黑 '.

sentences.en: Both nicotine and carbon monoxide inhaled with cigarette smoking have been incriminated as causative factors.
sentences.cn: 抽烟时吸入的尼古丁和一氧化碳都已经被标定为致病因素。

sentences.en: Especially in hearing - handicapped children , endolymphatic hydrops plays a major causative role in acute hearing loss.
sentences.cn: 本症须与内淋巴水肿、外淋巴瘘 、 腮腺炎耳聋、及积液性中耳炎等病症作?别诊断.

sentences.en: HIV is the causative agent of acquired immune deficiency syndrome ( AIDS ).
sentences.cn: 人类免疫缺陷病毒(HIV)是获得性免疫缺陷综合征 ( AIDS ) 的病原体.

sentences.en: In unsuccessful transmission experiments the causative agent could not be passed through bacteria - retaining filters.
sentences.cn: 在失败的传染实验中,致病因子不能通过细菌滤器.

sentences.en: Method The authors analysed the causative reasons and presented the preventive measures and precautions.
sentences.cn: 方法在分析并发症发生原因的基础上,提出预防措施及注意事项.

sentences.en: Objective : To analyse the clinical manifestations , radiological features and pathological changes and its causative pathogens of Madura foot ( Mycetoma ).
sentences.cn: 目的:分析马杜拉足的临床X线 特点及某些征象的病理基础,并对致病菌加以探讨.

sentences.en: Plasmodium is a protozoan which causes malaria; it is the causative agent of the disease.
sentences.cn: 疟原虫是引起疟疾的原生动物; 是疾病的病原体.

sentences.en: Slums are often causative of crime.
sentences.cn: 贫民窟常是犯罪的温床.

sentences.en: Smoking is a causative factor in several major diseases.
sentences.cn: 抽烟是引起几种严重疾病的病因。

sentences.en: Stress may be causative in some cases and secondary to depressed mood in others.
sentences.cn: 紧张在一些案例里可能是原因,在别的情况下可能继发抑郁情绪.

sentences.en: Syncope can be categorized based on the causative mechanism ( See Table below ).
sentences.cn: 根据诱发机制,晕厥可以分为几类.

sentences.en: The causative organisms included both gram positive and gram negative bacteria.
sentences.cn: 引起发炎的细菌包括革兰氐阴性及革兰氐阳性菌种.

sentences.en: The causative pathogen is influenza virus.
Using genome linkage scan and association studies, multiple potentially causative genes have been identified.
sentences.cn: 应用基因组连锁扫描和关联分析, 已经发现多个潜在的致病基因.

trans.tran_en: acting as the cause of something
